name: Jungle Rabbit Hunting 3D pro-Extreme Hunter 2017
description:
Jungle Rabbit Hunting

Jungle Rabbit Hunting 2016 presents the most addictive Rabbit shooting game.

Rabbits live in jungles and valleys. They eat carrots mostly and they are being hunted by wild animals of jungles and by humans. So we are providing to you a simple animal hunting simulator so that you enjoy hunting.
Jungle Rabbit Hunting 2016 is a relaxing first person perspective rabbit hunting game. Users can look around by swiping the screen. The game has 10 hunting levels so far. You hunt in village, near the river or in an island sometimes. We hope you like our 3D rabbit hunting game. This is not a war game. It is a simple animal hunting simulator.

Jungle Rabbit Hunting 2016 is most thrilling game ever seen for those who love hunting. This game will build your hunting capabilities like concentration, activeness, silence and always to the mark. For best hunting we are giving you the most precise sniper gun with scope added. Wild rabbits are very good source of proteins but to get them one have to hunt in jungle. These crazy creatures are too much active so be calm and active while hunting, because when they will get awareness of hunter’s presence they simply run towards their hoods ,they also make different calls to make other hares alert. So get inside the jungle and enjoy hunting.

Top game features 
 * First Person Shooting * Real-Time Jungle Environment * Efficient arms control * 3D graphics and sound effects * No connectivity required while playing 

Disclaimer.
Note: We are actually against innocent animal hunting.
The Rabbit hunting game is a game made for entertainment only animals not intended to actually aim to hunt or kill ABSOLUTELY orientation.
